trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around November 17th 2009
Summary: 15 too 18 glowing spheres in a v shape several moving and changing directions in the v formation.
divs: Sighting Detailssitting in hot tub for about 15 minutes wife noticed a formation many miles away comming from the north about 30 seconds later I finally saw them comming straight towards us. About 18 too 20 glowing balls of light in a v formation with many of them moving back and forth in a mechanical motion. As they got almost over our house they turned too the east in a slow turn and went behind our roof, my guess would be they were going at least 400 mph and 10,000 feet as compared too the jets that fly over.
